resources.string: Building a native AR app with Compose & OpenGL ES

This project showcases how to integrate OpenGL ES rendering with Jetpack Compose. The different samples go from more basic to more complex integrating ARCore.


This project has been created by Pau Guillamon for the Droidcon Berlin 2024 conference.
Basic implementation showcasing one possible way of integrating a GLSurfaceView within Compose.
Extends Sample1 by showcasing how multiple GL views can be used and applies different clipping to them.
Showcases a very basic "rendering" engine that shows a single rotating cube with a texture.
This sample integreates howing the camera feed from ARCore. There is a rotating cube floating as an overlay but it is not an Augmented Reality experience.
Full sample integrating ARCore and placing more cubes in the real world. The cubes are occluded when they appear behind a real world object.
